com.panviva.util.pgc.dom.processing

Interface ITransform

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CopyAdjacentTransformer, CopyTransformer, CreateTransformer, DeleteTransformer, DocumentPartitioner, FolderPartitioner, MoveTransformer, Partitioner, ReplaceTransformer, SectionPartitioner, TaskPartitioner, Transformer

    public interface ITransform
    This interface defines the methods required to execute and adjust transforms. A transform executes a rule to transform an xHtml common object model document.
    Author:
    jcharles

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • isValidOperation

        boolean isValidOperation(java.lang.String srcClass,
                         java.lang.String targetClass,
                         TaskType operation)
                  throws org.docx4j.openpackaging.exceptions.InvalidOperationException
        This method checks to see of the operation to be performed on the target is valid. It dpeends upon the combination of the type of source nodes target nodes and the operation to be performed.
        Parameters:
        srcClass - - The class of the first source node
        targetClass - - The class of the target node
        operation - - The operation being performed
        Returns:
        boolean Flag indicating if the operation is valid
        Throws:
        org.docx4j.openpackaging.exceptions.InvalidOperationException - Exception thrown if the operation is invalid

      • process

        void process()
      throws TransformException
        Process the transform.
        Throws:
        TransformException - Exception thrown if there a problem with the transform
